additions.old_line_content: pa =  s ? core->offset - s->vaddr + s->paddr : core->offset;

additions.new_api:
r_str_newf ("[0x%08"PFMT64x " *0x%08"PFMT64x" ($$+0x%x)]> %s %s\n",
						core->offset, core->offset + core->print->cur,
						core->print->cur,
						bar, pos)

r_str_newf ("[0x%08"PFMT64x " *0x%08"PFMT64x" ($$+0x%x)]> %s %s\n",

						bar, pos)

additions.new_api:

						core->offset, core->offset + core->print->cur,
						core->print->ocur, core->print->cur, R_ABS (core->print->cur - core->print->ocur) + 1,
						bar, pos)

r_str_newf ("[0x%08"PFMT64x " 0x%08"PFMT64x" [0x%x..0x%x] %d]> %s %s\n",

						core->print->ocur, core->print->cur, R_ABS (core->print->cur - core->print->ocur) + 1,
						bar, pos)
